title: Life is Feudal Your Own v0.2.0.0 [Steam Early Access]
description:
Life is Feudal: Your Own (LiF: YO ) is a game in a realistic medieval setting of the free terraforming and free construction. You can build your own little house with a kitchen garden anywhere in our world! Or cooperate with friends and build an entire village or town and reflect the raids of other players who want to conquer your land and steal your cows! Nice castle with a moat to help you keep them onslaught;)
The combat system in this game is pretty unique. This but-target physics-based system, where attacks depends on the movement of your mouse. Simple movement + attacks can be mixed in a deadly combo with special effects. Battle Formation is a new way of coordination and control of the situation on the battlefield. Depending on the situation, the squad leader must give the correct commands to change formations. At the same time, the more team members within the formation is, the more they will receive a bonus and thus will win disorganized enemies who rush around like a brainless chicken.
Speaking of the sandbox elements. Character development is not limited to artificial classes or roles. Skilkap and STATCAP systems allow you to create any character that best suits your style of play. In kraft system also lacks sendboksovosti :) For example, alchemy works almost the same as in the TES: Oblivion Ã‚Â© . But wikipedia and friends can not tell you the recipes, as all recipes are random for each character, and the only way to get to know them - it's an experiment.
Farming will require you to understand aspects such as: the difference between the crops, especially fertilization, understanding when to plant and harvest them. By the way, the fertilizer will be made Ã¢â‚¬â€¹Ã¢â‚¬â€¹in your barns and stables, which you have to manage and clean them. With proper care, you may print the best steeds of war on the island! You have to feed their cattle, but not limited to cattle. Food is important for the development of your character. The higher the quality of food that eats your character, the faster he will learn the skills and abilities. With this chef become one notch in importance to other craftsmen, such as blacksmiths, carpenters, or alchemists.
Features:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Unlimited terraforming and construction of tunnels. Dig tunnels, mines, ditches and expand them in all three dimensions, with virtually no restrictions! You can raise or lower the level of the ground and watch as the earth falls down from the hilltops to the pits in a natural way. Earth consists of various types of substances: soil, stone, granite, ore veins, clay, sand and many other! 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ The original system of combat formations. In combat situations, you have to react according to the combat situation and provide the necessary power-ups to his squad. But in order for members of the squad have received these bonuses - they must be organized and be strictly within the formation. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Virtually infinite number of alchemical combinations. There are over 40 million alchemical combinations and each is unique to each player! Unlike other online games, you may have to experiment and create your own unique combinations. Now alchemy is not just a figure in the skills of your character, and your personal ability to experiment and find good recipes. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ A comprehensive system of cooking and eating. Cooking food is no longer a secondary or no skill. Be a good cook who knows a lot of interesting and challenging recipes, so that your friends will be well fed and faster will increase your skills! 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Realistic damage system. Such damage system based on human anatomy, fractures, wounds and bleeding can give rise to many unexpected and unique tactics of warfare. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Dual scale lives and endurance. These dual scale better communicate sostoyanik body of your character. Character may lose consciousness or killed. It may be temporarily knock the breath or it will be completely emaciated.

Food is very important for character development and skill progression. The higher the quality of the food your character eats the faster they will progress through their skills. This places a cook on the same level as other craftspeople such as blacksmiths, carpenters or alchemists.
